_note: Configure your BTCPay Server connection and invoice generation parameters

_field_descriptions.api_key: string - Your BTCPay Server API key with invoice creation permissions
_field_descriptions.store_id: string - Your BTCPay Server store ID
_field_descriptions.base_url: string - Base URL of your BTCPay Server instance
_field_descriptions.count: integer - Number of invoices to generate
_field_descriptions.batch_size: integer - Number of concurrent requests per batch
_field_descriptions.delay: float - Delay between batches in seconds
_field_descriptions.output_dir: string - Directory to save invoice results

_workflow_note: This script generates invoices that can be paid by pay_invoices.py using addresses from generate-addresses.py
